entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pukatawagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
